# init(dictionary:)

**Initializer**

Creates the feature provider based on a dictionary.

## Declaration

```swift
init(dictionary: [String : Any]) throws
```

## Parameters

- **dictionary**: The dictionary of feature names and feature values.
title: init(dictionary:)
